column4: Hey guys. As much as I'm sorry to have to do it, I have to delete Ubuntu from my computer. I'm giving it away and the new owner doesn't want linux :(. I've heard some bad things about that...so how do I go about doing this oh so vexing task?
you will need to fix the MBR to and remove grub
